properties.name: slotbot.auth.token.name
properties.description: Name of the authentication token used to validate requests.

properties.name: server.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Origins for which cross-origin requests are allowed from a browser.

properties.name: discord.token
properties.description: The token of the discord bot. Found under https://discord.com/developers/applications.

properties.name: storage.download
properties.description: Path from which the /download endpoint obtains files.

properties.name: storage.calendarOutput
properties.description: Path to which calendar ics files can be written to and retrieved from.

properties.name: storage.userContent
properties.description: Path to which user provided files can be written to and retrieved from.
